message.content: {"given_definition_quality":60,"better_definition":"child; young child (with '儿' added at the end)","sentence":"小孩儿在家。","image_prompt":"A young child standing inside a house, with simple furniture, depicted in a soft apocalypse animation style: slightly muted colors, gentle lighting, a feeling of quietness and subtle uncertainty, with small hints of an unusual outside world visible through a simple window. The child looks curious but safe.","sentence_translation":"The child is at home."}
